title: Sample
medium:
Medium: 
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous supplementary weft (brocade)
inscribed: Written on cardboard by Trude Guermonprez. "INLALY WORK WITH GOLD AND SILK, T.GUERMONPREZ"
dimensions: Mount: 27.9 x 12.1 cm (11 in. x 4 3/4 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: White with metallic gold brocading. Some of the weft has been twisted to form 3 dimensional curls. Sample is mounted on cardboard.
